attributes.action: Convert Downing Street into a Yellow Brick Road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By re-paving Downing Street with yellow bricks, Mininsters of State may feel the urge to skip along singing 'We're off to see the Wizard' on their way to Cabinet meetings. This in turn would greatly increase the interest in politics among the public

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
